items.title: User Activity Tracking
items.description: Enable users to log and track workouts, steps, and calories burned via mobile app sensors and manual input.
acceptance_criteria: User can start, pause, and stop workout sessions
App records steps, distance, and calories during a session
User can manually add workout data
Data is stored and viewable in daily, weekly, and monthly summaries
non_functional: App response time under 2 seconds for activity logging

items.title: Social Sharing and Leaderboards
items.description: Allow users to share workout results and compete with friends via leaderboards.
acceptance_criteria: User can connect with friends within the app
User can share workout summaries to a public or friends-only feed
Leaderboards display top performers for daily, weekly, and monthly periods
Privacy settings allow user to control visibility of shared data
non_functional: Leaderboard updates within 1 minute of new activity

notes: Assumed that the app will integrate with device sensors for tracking and include a backend for social features. Specific platforms (iOS/Android) and integration with third-party fitness APIs not specified.
